1065:3: yadi iha saṃtānāvicchedakrameṇa janmamaraṇaparaṃparayā hetuphalabhāvapravṛttyā saṃskārāṇāmātmano vā saṃsaraṇaṃ syāt,
1065:5: yathāvarṇite saṃsārābhāve tu utpattyanantaravināśitvāccittasya karmākṣepakāle ca vipākasyāsadbhāvāt karmaphalasaṃbandhābhāva eva syāt |
1065:6: saṃsārasadbhāve tu sati iha kṛtasya karmaṇe janmāntare'pi vipākaphalasaṃbandhāt karmaṇāṃ phalasaṃbandho na virodhito bhavati |
1065:8: kāni punastāni karmāṇi kiṃ vā tatphalamiti tatprabheda vivakṣayedamucyate -
1065:10: maitraṃ sa dharmastadbījaṃ phalasya pretya ceha ca ||1||
1065:13: cinoti upacinoti śubhamaśubhaṃ karma vipākadānasāmarthye niyamayatīti cetaḥ |
1065:15: ātmānaṃ saṃyamayati viṣayeṣvasvatantrayati rāgādikleśavaśena pravṛttiṃ nivārayatītyātmasaṃyamakam |
1065:16: tadetadātmasaṃyamakaṃ kuśalaṃ cetaḥ prāṇātipātādiṣu pravṛtti vidhārakaṃ durgatigamanāddhārayatīti dharma ityucyate ||
1065:19: tatra svalakṣaṇadhāraṇārthena sarve sāsravā anāsravāśca dharmā ityucyante |
1065:21: dharmacārī sukhaṃ śete asmiṃlloke paratra ca ||
1065:25: kiṃ punarātmasaṃyamakamevaikaṃ cetaḥ dharma iti ? netyāha |
1065:26: kiṃ tarhi parānugrāhakaṃ ca maitraṃ ca yaccetaḥ,
1065:45: yattu sādhāraṇaṃ kṣityādi na tadbījaṃ kāraṇametat |
1065:47: ihāpi iṣṭasya vipākasyābhinirvṛttau trividhaṃ ceto bhavati bījam |
1065:49: kasmin punaḥ kāle bījasya phalaniṣpattirityāha - pretya ceha ca |

1065:65: manodvāreṇaiva niṣṭhāgamanāt kāyavākpravṛttinirapekṣatvācca manovijñāna saṃprayuktaiva cetanā mānasaṃ karmetyucyate |
1065:69: evaṃ ca evaṃ ca kāyavāgbhyāṃ pravartiṣye ityevaṃ cetasā saṃcintya yat kriyate,

1065:75: etadapi trividhaṃ karma punarbhidyamānaṃ saptavidhaṃ saṃjāyate,
1065:76: ityevaṃ tasya karmaṇo bhagavatā bahuprakāro bhedo'nuvarṇitaḥ |
1065:81: cetanā ceti saptaite dharmāḥ karmāñjanāḥ smṛtāḥ ||5||
1065:84: tatra kuśalākuśalā vā vāk sarvaiva viratyaviratilakṣaṇā vijñaptisamutthāpikā sāmānyena vāgiti gṛhyate |
1065:85: evaṃ kuśalo'kuśalo vā viratyaviratilakṣaṇo vijñaptisamutthāpako viṣpandaḥ sāmānyena gṛhyate ||
1065:89: tatra aviratilakṣaṇā avijñaptayaḥ tadyathā adyaprabhṛti mayā prāṇinaṃ hatvā cauryaṃ kṛtvā jīvikā parikalpayitavyeti pāpakarmābhyupagamātprabhṛti tadakāriṇo'pi akuśalakarmābhyupagamahetukāḥ satatasamitamavijñaptayaḥ samupajāyante |
1065:90: kaivartādīnāṃca jālādiparikarmakālātprabhṛti tadakāriṇāmapi yā avijñaptaya upajāyante,
1065:92: yathā caitāstathā anyāḥ viratilakṣaṇāḥ kuśalasvabhāvā avijñaptayaḥ |
1065:93: tadyathā - adyaprabhṛti prāṇātipātādibhyaḥ prativiramāmīti kāyavāgvijñaptiparisamāptikāla kṣaṇātprabhṛti taduttarakālaṃ pramattādyavasthasyāpi yāḥ kuśalopacayasvabhāvā avijñaptaya upajāyante,
1065:95: etā rūpakriyāsvabhāvā api satyo vijñaptivat parānna vijñāpayantītyavijñaptayaḥ ||
1065:106: yathā yathā hi tatkīrtau prāṇino hanyante,
1065:107: tathā tathā taddevakulādyupabhogāt tatkartṛṇāṃ saṃtāne paribhogānvayamapuṇyamapi jāyate ,
1065:110: saṃkṣepeṇa etatsaptavidhaṃ karma bhavati - kuśalākuśalā vāk,
1065:117: ete ca sapta dharmāḥ karmāñjanāḥ karmatvenābhivyaktāḥ karmalakṣaṇāḥ smṛtāḥ ||5||
1065:120: atha na tiṣṭhati utpattyanantaravināśitvāt? yadi tāvat -
1065:123: yadi utpannaṃ sat karma āvipākakālaṃ svarūpeṇāvatiṣṭhate iti parikalpyate,
1065:124: tad iyantaṃ kālamasya nityatā āpadyate vināśarahitatvāt |
1065:127: pūrvaṃ vināśarahitasya ākāśādivat paścādapi vināśena saṃbandhābhāvāt |
1065:134: niruddhaṃ cenniruddhaṃ sat kiṃ phalaṃ janayiṣyati |
1065:135: abhāvībhūtaṃ sat karma avidyamānasvabhāvatvānnaiva phalaṃ janayiṣyatītyabhiprāyaḥ ||6||
1065:139: niruddhaṃ cenniruddhaṃ sat kiṃ phalaṃ janayiṣyati |
1065:143: iha bījaṃ kṣaṇikamapi sat svajātīyabhāviphalaviśeṣaniṣpattisāmarthyaviśeṣayuktasyaiva saṃtānasya aṅkurakāṇḍanālapatrādyabhidhānasya hetubhāvamapyupagamya nirudhyate |
1065:145: tasmāt krameṇa sahakārikāraṇavaikalye sati svalpādapi hetorvipulaphalapracaya upajāyate |
1065:146: ṛte bījāt vinā bījāt sa ca aṅkurādisaṃtānaḥ nābhipravartate |
1065:147: tadevaṃ tadbhāve bhāvitvena tadabhāve ca abhāvitvena bījahetukatvamaṅkurādisaṃtānasya phalasyopadarśitaṃ bhavati ||7||
1065:158: yathā ca bīje ayaṃ kramo'nuvarṇitaḥ, evam -
1065:162: tasmāt kuśalākuśalacetanāparibhāvitāccittasaṃtānāt sahakārikāraṇasaṃnidhānāvaikalye sati iṣṭamaniṣṭaṃ phalamupajāyate sugatidurgatiṣu |
1065:163: ṛte tu taccitāt cittamantareṇa sa ca nābhipravartate ||9||
1065:167: yadi arhaccaramacittamiva taddhetuphalapāraṃparyāvicchinnakramavartino bhāvinaścittasaṃtānasya hetubhāvamanupagamya kuśalaṃ cittaṃ nirudhyeta,
1065:169: athāpi anāgata saṃtānasya hetubhāvamupagamya svarūpādapracyutaṃ syāt,
1065:173: tadatra yathoditakarmaprabhedavyākhyāne daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathā vyākhyātāḥ | te ca -
1065:175: phalaṃ kāmaguṇāḥ pañca dharmasya pretya ceha ca ||11||
1065:176: ta ete daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathā dharmasya sādhanopāyā niṣpattihetubhūtā ityarthaḥ ||
1065:183: pariniṣṭhitarūpā ete daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathā dharmaśabdavācyā bhavanti,
1065:185: tadasya uktalakṣaṇasya ete daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathā niṣpattau hetutvena vyavasthāpyante |
1065:186: kathaṃ punaratra prakrānte karmavibhāge daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathā iti ? ucyate -
1065:189: cetanā cetyanena abhidhyāvyāpāda samyagdṛṣṭayākhyāsrayo mānasā vyākhyātāḥ |
1065:190: ityevaṃ daśāpi kuśalāḥ karmapathā atra vyākhyātāḥ |
1065:191: te ca yathoditasya dharmasya niṣpattihetavo bhavanti |
1065:192: asya ca dharmasya rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyalakṣaṇāḥ pañca kāmaguṇāḥ |
1065:197: tān prati apare doṣamudbhāvya anyākṣepaparihāraṃ varṇayantaḥ āhuḥ -
1065:201: tadā bahavaśca doṣāḥ saṃkhyābahutvena mahāntaśca dṛṣṭādṛṣṭavirodhena parapakṣe prāpruvanti |
1065:203: yadi hi bījasaṃtānadṛṣṭāntena śālibījāt śālyaṅkurādisaṃtāna eva pravartate,
1065:214: kāmarūpārūpyāvacarānāsravacittebhyaḥ sadṛśānāmeva cittānāṃ kāmarūpārūpyāva carānāsravāṇāmutpādaḥ syāt,
1065:217: tataśca yo devaḥ sa deva eva syāt,
1065:218: yo manuṣyaḥ sa manuṣya eva syādityādi |
1065:219: tataśca akuśalamapi kurvatāṃ devamanuṣyāṇāṃ gatiyonivarṇabuddhīndriyabalarūpabhogādi vaicitryaṃ na syādapāyapatanaṃ ca |
1065:221: evaṃ bahavaśca mahāntaśca doṣā yasmādbīja saṃtānasādharmyakalpanāyāṃ prasajyante,
1065:223: imāṃ punaḥ pravakṣyāmi kalpanāṃ yātra yojyate |
1065:228: iha kuśalaṃ karma kṛtaṃ sat utpādānantarameva nirudhyate,
1065:231: tadā etasya karmaṇo'vipraṇāśo nāma viprayukto dharmaḥ kartuḥ saṃtāne samupajāyate ṛṇapatrasthānīyaḥ |
1065:232: tadevaṃ patraṃ yathā avipraṇāśaḥ tathā veditavyaḥ |
1065:233: yasya ca asau avipraṇāśākhyo dharma utpadyate,
1065:235: yathā ca ṛṇapatrāvasthānāt prayukte'pi dhane dhanino na dhananāśo bhavati,
1065:236: saṃbadhyata eva sa kālāntareṇa pañcamena dhanaskandhena,
1065:237: tathā vinaṣṭe'pi karmaṇi avipraṇāśākhyadharmāntarāvasthānāt tannimittakena phalena abhisaṃbadhyata eva kartā |
1065:238: yathā ca ṛṇapatraṃ dāturdhanābhyāgamaṃ kṛtvā nirmuktaṃ sat punarapi vidyamānaṃ vā avidyamānaṃ vā na dhanābhyāgame samartham,
1065:239: evamavipraṇāśo'pi dattavipākaḥ san vidyamāno vā avidyamāno vā na śaknoti nirmuktapatravat kartuḥ punarapi vipākasaṃbandhaṃ kartum ||
1065:251: prahāṇato na praheyo bhāvanāheya eva vā |
1065:253: pārthagjanikāni karmāṇi darśanamārgeṇaiva prahīyante mā bhūdāryaḥ pṛthagjanakarmasamanvāgata iti |
1065:255: kiṃ tu bhāvanāmārgeṇa vā tasyā prahāṇaṃ bhavati |
1065:260: yadi punarapi asya avipraṇāśasya karmaṇaḥ prahāṇena prahāṇātprahāṇataḥ prahāṇaṃ syāt karmaṇaśca saṃkrameṇa karmaṇo vināśena karmāntarasaṃmukhībhāvena vināśaḥ syāt,
1065:269: evaṃ karmavadhādayo doṣāḥ prasajyante prahāṇataḥ praheyatvābhyupagame sati avipraṇāśasya |
1065:275: teṣāṃ sarveṣāmeva sabhāgānāṃ ca viṣabhāgānāṃ ca karmaṇāṃ kāmarūpārūpyadhātupratisaṃdhiṣu sarvakarmāpamardanaḥ eka eva avipraṇāśa utpadyate |
1065:276: sa cāpi sadhātūnāṃ samānadhātukānāmeva utpadyate na viṣabhāgadhātukānām ||17||
1065:277: karmaṇaḥ karmaṇo dṛṣṭe dharma utpadyate tu saḥ |
1065:279: sa cāyamavipraṇāśākhyo dharmaḥ sarvasyaiva karmaṇaḥ cetanācetayitvāsvabhāvasya sāsravānāsravabhedena vā dviprakārabhinnasya dṛṣṭe dharme ihaiva janmani karmaṇaḥ karmaṇaḥ ekaiko'vipraṇāśa utpadyate |
1065:280: sa cāyamavipraṇāśo vipakke'pi vipāke nāvaśyaṃ nirudhyate,
1065:281: nirbhuktapatravacca vidyamāno'pi san na śaknoti punarapi vipaktum ||18||
1065:283: anāsravaṃ sāsravaṃ ca vibhāgaṃ tatra lakṣayet ||19||
1065:291: śūnyatā ca na cocchedaḥ saṃsāraśca na śāśvatam |
1065:299: avipraṇāśadharmasadbhāvāt bījasaṃtānasādharmyaparikalpanābhāvācca nānāgatijātiyonidhātubhedabhinnaśca pāñcagatikaḥ saṃsāro vicitraḥ siddho bhavati |
1065:304: evaṃ niravaśeṣāvidyānidrāpagamādvibuddhena bhagavatā yasmādayaṃ dharmo deśitaḥ,
1065:307: niruddhaṃ cenniruddhaṃ sat kiṃ phalaṃ janayiṣyati || iti,
1065:310: atrocyate- kimiha bhavanto gandharvanagaraprākārapatanātiśaṅkitayā atīvodvignāḥ tatparirakṣāpariśramāyāsamāpannāḥ,
1065:311: ye nāma yūyaṃ karmaṇyanupapadyamāne tatphalanimittaṃ vipravadadhvam?
1065:325: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām ||iti ?
1065:330: avaśyaṃ caitadevaṃ vijñeyam- niḥsvabhāvaṃ karmeti | anyathā hi -
1065:332: akṛtaṃ ca bhavetkarma kriyate na hi śāśvatam ||22||
1065:342: yacca vidyamānaṃ tasya karaṇānupapatteḥ tannaiva kāraṇamapekṣata iti ||22||
1065:343: śubhāśubhe karmaṇi akṛta eva sakalasya lokasya vipāko yasmāt, tataśca -
1065:350: tasyāpi akṛtamapi sat tat karma astyeveti tenāpyasya saṃbandhādakṛtābhyāgamabhayaṃ syāt |
1065:355: vyavahārā virudhyante sarva eva na saṃśayaḥ |
1065:357: ye hi ete kṛṣivāṇijyagorakṣādayaḥ kriyārambhāḥ phalārthamārabhyante,
1065:366: ubhayorapi puṇyapāpakṛtoḥ akṛtayorapi puṇyapāpayoḥ pratyekaṃ vidyamānatvāt || 24||
1065:373: yasmāt tatkarma vyavasthitamasti tasmānniḥsaṃśayaṃ yathopavarṇitā doṣāḥ prāpnuvanti sasvabhāvatve |
1065:389: karma kleśātmakaṃ cedaṃ te ca kleśā na tattvataḥ |
1065:390: na cette tattvataḥ kleśāḥ karma syāttattvataḥ katham ||26||
1065:395: te svabhāvānna vidyante tasmātkleśā na tattvataḥ ||iti |
1065:399: atrāha - vidyanta eva kleśā karmāṇi ca,
1065:409: karma kleśāśca te śūnyā yadi deheṣu kā kathā ||27||
1065:412: tataśca karma kleśā yadā na santi,
1065:413: tadā tatkāryāṇāṃ dehānāmasattve kā kathā bhaviṣyati?
1065:422: sa bhoktā sa ca na karturanyo na ca sa eva saḥ ||28||
1065:423: tatra avidyā ajñānaṃ tamaḥ saṃmoha iti paryāyāḥ |
1065:425: pāñcagatika saṃsāre punaḥ punarjāyata iti jantuḥ |
1065:431: atha ca punaridaṃ pāpaṃ karma svayameva kṛtam,
1065:432: asya svayameva vipākaḥ pratyanubhavitavyaḥ iti vacanāt |
1065:438: atrocyate - syātkarmaṇaḥ kartā karmaphalasya copabhoktā yadi karmaiva syāt |
1065:443: karma cennāsti kartā ca kutaḥ syātkarmajaṃ phalam |
1065:444: asatyatha phale bhoktā kuta eva bhaviṣyati ||30||
1065:452: tadapi - hetāvasati kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ ca ityādinā karmakārakaparīkṣāyāṃ vistareṇa pratipāditam |
1065:453: yataścaivaṃ pratyayasamutpannaṃ vā apratyayasamutpannaṃ vā karmedaṃ na saṃbhavati,
1065:455: yadā caivaṃ karma ca kartā ca nāsti,
1065:456: tadā nirhetukaṃ karmajaṃ phalaṃ kuto bhaviṣyatīti,
1065:457: asati ca phale kuta eva phalabhoktā bhaviṣyatīti,
1065:459: atrāha - yadi evaṃ naiḥsvābhāvyaṃ bhāvānāṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ bhavati,
1065:460: yattarhi etaduktaṃ bhagavatā -svayaṃ kṛtasya karmaṇaḥ svayameva vipākaḥ pratyanubhavitavyaḥ iti,
1065:468: atha manyase - niḥsvabhāvānāṃ bhāvānāṃ vyāpārakaraṇānupapatteḥ tadavastha eva doṣa iti,
1065:472: tathāhi niḥsvabhāvā eva santo ghaṭādayaḥ loke svakāryakṛt upalabhyante ||30||
1065:475: nirmito nirmimītānyaṃ sa ca nirmitakaḥ punaḥ ||31||
1065:476: tadyathā - ekaṃ nirmitakaṃ śāstā buddho bhagavān ṛddhisaṃpadā ṛddhiprabhāveṇa nirmimīta,
1065:477: sa cāpi nirmitakaḥ punaḥ yo'yaṃ buddhena bhagavatā nirmitaḥ,
1065:479: tatra ya eṣa nirmitakaḥ aparasya nirmitakasya nirmātā,
1065:487: tathā nirmitakākāraḥ kartā karma ca tatkṛtam |
1065:489: yo hyatra karmaṇaḥ kartā sa nirmitakākāraḥ svabhāvaśūnyaḥ |
1065:490: tena ca svabhāvaśūnyena svatantrakartrā yat kiṃcit karma kriyate,
1065:492: tadyathā nirmitakena anyo nirmitako nirmitaḥ tathā veditavyam |
1065:519: tannirmitabodhisattvena gandhasugandhāyāṃ lokadhātau samantabhadratathāgatopabhuktaśeṣaṃ bhojanamānītaṃ nānāvyañjanakhādyādisaṃprayuktaṃ pṛthakpṛthagvividharasamekabhojanena sarvaṃ tacchrāvakabodhisattvasaṃgharājarājāmātyapurohitāntaḥ puradauvārikasārthavāhādijanapadaṃ saṃtarpya prītyākāraṃ nāma mahāsamādhiṃ lambhayāmāsa | iti ||
1065:524: api ca amībhyo dṛṣṭāntebhyaḥ sphuṭaṃ naiḥsvabhāvyaṃ bhāvānāṃ pratīyatāmiti pratipādayannāha -
1065:525: kleśāḥ karmāṇi dehāśca kartāraśca phalāni ca |
1065:537: pañca ca bhikṣuśatāni dhyānalābhīni utthāyāsanebhyaḥ prakrāntāni imāṃ gambhīrāṃ dharmadeśanā manavabudhyamānāni anavataranti anavagāhamānāni anadhimucyamānāni |
1065:538: bhagavānāha - tathā hyete kāśyapa bhikṣavaḥ ābhimānikāḥ imāmanāsravāṃ śīlaviśuddhiṃ nāvataranti nāvagāhante nādhimucyante uttrasyanti saṃtrasyanti saṃtrāsamāpadyante |
1065:539: gambhīraḥ kāśyapa gāthābhinirhāro gambhīrā ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ bodhiḥ |
1065:542: etāni kāśyapa pañca bhikṣuśatāni kāśyapasya tathāgatasya pravacane'nyatīrthikaśrāvakā abhūvan |
1065:543: taireva tasya kāśyapasya tathāgatasyāntikādupālambhābhiprāyaireṣā dharmadeśanā śrutā |
1065:545: evaṃtairvāg bhāṣitā - āścaryaṃ yāvat madhurapriyamāṇī kāśyapastathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha iti |
1065:546: ta etenaikacittaprasādena pratilabdhena kālagatāḥ trāyastriṃśeṣu deveṣūpapannāḥ |
1065:548: tenaiva ca hetunā iha mama śāsane pravrajitāḥ |
1065:549: tānyetāni kāśyapa pañca bhikṣuśatāni dṛṣṭipraskandhāni imāṃ gambhīrāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ nāvataranti nāvagāhante nādhimucyante uttrasyanti saṃtrasyanti saṃtrāsamāpadyante kṛtaṃ punareṣāmanayā dharmadeśanayā parikarma |
1065:552: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimāmantrayate sma - gaccha subhūte,
1065:554: subhūtirāha - bhagavata eva tāvadete bhāṣitaṃ vilomayanti,
1065:556: atha bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāṃ yena mārgeṇaite bhikṣāvo gacchanti sma,
1065:557: tasmin mārge drau bhikṣū nirmimīte sma |
1065:558: atha tāni pañca bhikṣuśatāni yena mārgeṇa tau dvau bhikṣū nirmitakau tenopasaṃkrāmanti sma |
1065:562: tānyapi pañca bhikṣuśatānyetadavocan - vayamapyāyuṣmantau bhagavato dharmadeśanāṃ nāvatarāmo nāvagāhāmahe nādhimucyāmahe uttrasyāmaḥ saṃtrasyāmaḥ saṃtrāsamāpadyāmahe |
1065:564: nirmitakāvavocatām - tena hi āyuṣmantaḥ saṃgāsyāmo na vivadiṣyāmaḥ |
1065:568: kaścitpunaratra kāyaḥ ātmā vā sattvo vā jīvo vā janturvā poṣo vā puruṣo vā pudgalo vā manujo vā mānavo va,
1065:572: nirmitakāvavocatām - kiṃ punarāyuṣmatāṃ saṃvidyante rāgadveṣamohā yān kṣayiṣyatha?
1065:573: te'vocan - na te adhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayamantareṇopalabhyante,
